meanings.definition: A South African term for a barbecue or grill.
meanings.sent1: We had a braai with friends over the weekend.
meanings.sent2: The smell of the braai filled the air with deliciousness.
meanings.sent3: The braai was so hot, it cooked the food in no time!
meanings.sent4: The flames of the braai danced in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The sizzle of the meat on the braai was music to our ears.

meanings.definition: To cook food on a grill or barbecue.
meanings.sent1: Let's braai some sausages for dinner tonight.
meanings.sent2: They always braai chicken on Sundays.
meanings.sent3: I braai so well, even the neighbors want to join!
meanings.sent4: The chef braaied the vegetables to perfection.
meanings.sent5: She loves to braai fish by the beach for a special treat.
